snippet: The deal reflects a growing push across the industry to better understand how digital changes are transforming the way people consume entertainment.
abstract: NBC Universal is expected to announce partnership with TiVo and RealityMine to track how viewers watch Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro; deal is part of growing focus in industry on understanding how digital technology is changing way people consume entertainment.
lead_paragraph: The deal reflects a growing push across the industry to better understand how digital changes are transforming the way people consume entertainment.

headline.main: NBCUniversal to Team With Data Trackers to Study Olympics Viewing
headline.print_headline: A Partnership to Track Olympics Viewing
